Puzzle Master 2

puzzle

About Puzzle Master 2

Challenge your mind with this addictive puzzle game! Match colors, solve patterns, and unlock new levels as you progress through 100+ brain-teasing challenges.

How to Play

Match three or more blocks of the same color to clear them from the board. Create special power-ups by matching 4 or more blocks!
